channel.title: Need Hoster/Coder
channel.description: Im needing a Coder or a Hoster... im making a pk server with the base [PI] Deception and i want some1 to host it and help me with coding and webclient making For me if u are new coder is okay i only want some1 that can make a webclient and the hoster if it can then i wanted to have a 24/7 hoster :P Im giving Coder and Hoster status in my server :D!

item.title: Need Hoster/Coder

item.description:
@Tom wrote:

You’re not allowed to request hosters/coders.

Read full topic
